 From the SFLA BlogToday on Explicitly Pro-Life: Disney Isn’t What It Used To BeCaroline Wharton - 27 Apr 2022

Today on  Explicitly Pro-Life, the podcast hosted by SFLA president Kristan Hawkins, Hawkins discusses the unfortunate reality that parents need to be careful of the new, woke Disney if they don’t want their children inundated with sexual material.
The episode, entitled “Disney Has Officially Lost Its Mind,” details the fall of Disney from its former innocent and beautiful content to its present state of sexually inappropriate material.
Hawkins discusses an op-ed she wrote for Fox News recently which exposed Disney’s new “Turning Red” movie and the Zoom call with Disney executives that totally blew their cover as proof of new Disney’s purposeful perversity.

Hawkins says, “As a parent, it’s very shocking because we grew up with old Disney, and we loved old Disney…but then to see these Disney executives say all the ways they’re transforming their business model and what they’re doing to insert this very liberal agenda into their movies, it’s shocking and maddening.”
Hawkins also emphasized that the problematic themes within new Disney movies are for the purpose of grooming young children and pushing them out into an adult’s sexualized world.
Tune in today to join Hawkins explain why parents can’t blindly trust Disney+ to protect their child’s innocence anymore.
Click HERE to listen!
Click HERE to subscribe to Explicitly Pro-Life.
